name: Halloween
about: Halloween takes place on the last night of October. People decorate their homes with spooky lights, glowing pumpkins, and hanging ghosts. Kids dress up and walk door-to-door saying 'trick or treat!' to collect candy. It‚Äôs a playful celebration filled with surprises and a fun little scare.

name: Christmas
about: Christmas arrives each December with twinkling lights, warm drinks, and family gatherings. People enjoy decorating their homes, exchanging gifts, and sharing special meals. Joyful music plays everywhere, bringing a cozy and cheerful feeling to the holiday season.

activities.title: Holiday Story Night
activities.details: Pick your favorite winter books and read them together under the Christmas tree while sipping warm cocoa. A cozy moment for everyone! üìö‚ú®

activities.title: Snowflake Window Art
activities.details: Cut paper snowflakes in different patterns and tape them to windows to make your home feel like a winter wonderland.

name: Easter
about: Easter is a bright and colorful celebration of springtime. Families gather for brunch, decorate their homes with pastel colors, and enjoy outdoor fun together. Flowers bloom, birds sing, and the season feels full of new beginnings and happiness.

activities.title: Bunny Mask Making
